import { useState, useEffect } from "react" const BOT = () => { const [text,setText] = useState('') const [post,setPost] = useState([]) //Process each lines of text-area function handleTextArea(event){ setText(event.target.value) const lines = text.split('\n') setPost(lines) console.log(post) } return (
